changed.esis_errors_xmlimport_text: The module's XML configuration file '#' hasn't been loaded.

added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status1: The XML file was not found.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status2: A CDATA section was not properly terminated.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status3: The XML declaration was not properly terminated.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status4: The DOCTYPE declaration was not properly terminated.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status5: A comment was not properly terminated.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status8: An attribute value was not properly terminated.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status9: A start-tag was not matched with an end-tag.
added.esis_errors_xmlimport_status10: An end-tag was encountered without a matching start-tag.
added.esis_errors_swfimport_text:
The module's file '#' hasn't been loaded.
Please contact your administrator if problem persists.
